snippet: A spokesman for President Nicolas Sarkozy of France denied a suggestion by Mediapart that the campaign received illegal financial support from Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi.
abstract: Spokesman for French Pres Nicolas Sarkozy denies a suggestion by the investigative group Mediapart that Sarkozy's 2007 election campaign received more than $65 million in illegal financial support from former Libyan dictator Muammar el-Qaddafi.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman for President Nicolas Sarkozy of France denied a suggestion by Mediapart that the campaign received illegal financial support from Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi.

headline.seo: Group Suggests Qaddafi Role in Sarkozy’s ’07 Campaign
headline.main: Group Suggests That Qaddafi Aided Sarkozy’s 2007 Campaign
headline.print_headline: France: Group Suggests That Qaddafi Aided Sarkozy
